docs.text:
Electronics, Physics, Tech & Mathematics. Research, notes, and experiments.

  • Lab: Breadboard/PCB experiments — oscillators, SR latches, amplifiers

docs.title: Quantum Mechanics Summary
docs.text:
!!! note "About this summary" These notes summarize the key results, operators, and examples from the course, based on my own condensed material.

## PDF Summary 📘 Download the full summary (PDF)

## Topics covered - Foundations and measurement - Harmonic oscillator and ladder operators - Angular momentum and spin - Tensor products and entanglement
